alert.note: Alert for Faribault (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Faribault County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blue Earth, or 19 miles east of Fairmont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Frost around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bricelyn and Wells. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 113 and 142. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Minnesota.
